text: Aspergillus pulvericola is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Circumdati section. The species was first described in 2004. A. pulvericola produces ochratoxin A. ==Growth and morphology== A. pulvericola has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below. Aspergillus_pulvericola_cya.png|Aspergillus pulvericola growing on CYA plate Aspergillus_pulvericola_meaox.png|Aspergillus pulvericola growing on MEAOX plate ==References== pulvericola Category:Fungi described in 2014
title: Aspergillus pulvericola
